text:
It's not a bug, but an enhancement.
It will be a great help if you activate ctrl F to search a text in the "View
Results Tree Listener" in the "response data/show text" tab. this will be very
helpful to search the html code of the page to copy it and paste it in the
"Response assertion/paterns to test".
creator: nbekrar@jouve.fr
nop.lists@gmail.com
text:
good idea!
How about activating ctrl F also to search in the testplan tree? Would be very
useful, at least for me.

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 24211
Proposal patch to add search

Thanks very much for the patch, applied as follows:

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=813160&view=rev
Log:
Bug 36726 - add search function to Tree View Listener

Note that ^F is already used for the Function Helper dialogue, so cannot be used here. It's not really necessary to have a shortcut key for searching within the Tree View Listener.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: Note: this patch allow CTRL-T to (un)hide the search pane.
creator: milamber@apache.org

text: *** Bug 48190 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: sebb@apache.org
